achievements: Responsible for frontend team technical architecture design and tech stack selection

Established component library and design system, improving development efficiency
Optimized project build process, reducing build time by 60%
Participated in mobile hybrid app development, accumulating cross-platform experience
Built frontend tech stack and development standards from scratch
Responsible for frontend development of company official website and management backend

keyInsights: Combination of technical depth and management breadth is a core competitive advantage

Market opportunities highly match personal capability development direction
Should fully utilize Shenzhen's tech environment and opportunities
strategicRecommendations: Focus on developing frontend architecture design and system design capabilities
Deepen performance optimization and engineering professional skills
Build personal technical brand and influence
